title: Output Box
label: Output Box
notes: A <figure> that displays the output resulting from some code; uses the output class

context.output:
Luke, we’re ready for takeoff. Good luck, Lando When we find Jabba the Hut and that bounty hunter, we’ll contact you.

I’ll meet you at the rendezvous point on Tatooine. Princess, we’ll find Han. I promise. Chewie, I’ll be waiting for your signal. Take care, you two. May the Force be with you.

variants.name: reverse
variants.notes: Version of the figure that allows the user to toggle between default display and display using the reverse class

context.output:
Luke, we’re ready for takeoff. Good luck, Lando When we find Jabba the Hut and that bounty hunter, we’ll contact you.

I’ll meet you at the rendezvous point on Tatooine. Princess, we’ll find Han. I promise. Chewie, I’ll be waiting for your signal. Take care, you two. May the Force be with you.
